events.name: Hackware: Holiday 2015 Special
events.description: Hackware is a monthly meetup for hardware developers and enthusiasts to share hacks and developments in the hardware scene, promote hardware development and to build a community of hardware developers. Our talks typically include side projects by speakers on electronics, embedded system, radio communications, internet of things, radio frequency and much more! Come and just drop by for all our open and free meetups, make friends with fellow enthusiasts or beginners and feel free to sign up for a talk slot on whatever you are working on. Agenda & Talks for this meetup: 1. (20min) ESP Lisp - Jonas S Karlsson2. (5min each) Lightning Talks on your homemade hacks by anyone 3. Announcements by anyone on:- Hiring positions- Available for hire- Other upcoming hardware-related events locally or anywhere else 4. Socialize and network with other Hackware members Talks : ~20minsLightning Talks : ~5minsAnnouncements: ~1min Happy Holidays everyone â™¥
events.location: Hackerspace.SG, 344B King George's Ave, King George's Building, Singapore
